name: Tuhin Kumar Singha Roy
about: Highly motivated and results-driven Computer Science Engineering Student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, with a strong foundation in Data Analytics and Cloud technologies. Eager to leverage expertise in developing AI-powered solutions, optimizing data-driven strategies, and contributing to digital transformation initiatives. Proven ability to build, train, and deploy machine learning models, with hands-on experience in Python, TensorFlow, AWS, and advanced NLP techniques.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and ML)

experience.description: Developed and trained diverse AI, ML, and Deep Learning models, including LLMs, contributing to early-stage AI solution development. Gained practical experience deploying models on AWS, while maintaining documentation and building prototypes.

Developed CNN for plant disease detection (38 classes, 85%+ accuracy; processed 63,000+ images). Built & deployed (Flask) ML pipelines for crop/fertilizer recommendation (90% accuracy; trained on 1000+ records).

projects.title: AI-Powered Email Spam Classifier
projects.description: Developed an interactive web application that classifies email content as Spam or Not Spam using Google's Gemini LLM API. Engineered structured prompts with few-shot examples to extract JSON-based AI output including classification, confidence score, reasoning, and risk level.

projects.title: InterviewGPT â€“ AI Mock Interview
projects.description: Built a web app that generates role-based interview questions and evaluates spoken/text answers using Gemini LLM with JSON-based feedback and scoring. Integrated voice input, real-time feedback, and result visualization.

projects.title: Plant Disease Detection System using CNN
projects.description: Developed a CNN-based model to classify 38 plant disease classes with 85%+ accuracy. Processed 63,000+ plant leaf images for training and evaluation, deployed using Streamlit for real-time predictions.

projects.title: Crop and Fertilizer Recommendation System
projects.description: Built separate ML pipelines using Random Forest for crop and fertilizer prediction with 90% accuracy. Trained on 1000+ agricultural records using features like soil type, temperature, and humidity. Deployed via Flask to support smart farming.

projects.title: Farmer-Friend (AI Assistant)
projects.description: Built an AI-powered recommendation system to assist farmers in selecting the best and most profitable crops based on location and suitable fertilizers based on soil components. Used Mistral API for intelligent recommendations.

projects.title: AI Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an interactive chatbot using Mistral API, Flask, and Python, enabling real-time responses. Integrated NLP techniques for improved context-aware conversations and user engagement.

projects.title: 2D and 3D Drone Irrigation Simulation
projects.description: Created a simulation system to analyze drone-based irrigation in 2D and 3D environments. Simulated real-world water distribution models to improve agricultural irrigation strategies and promote sustainable farming.

achievements.title: SIH2024 Team Leader
achievements.description: Directed a successful team effort which won the College Internal Hackathon. Developed an application that increased sales process efficiency for farmers.

achievements.title: Brain Verse 2025 - 2nd Place
achievements.description: Secured 2nd Place in Brainverse Competition (Intra-College) as Team Leader.

achievements.title: Intra-College Football Champion
achievements.description: Won 2025 Intra-College Football Tournament as team member.

faqs.question: What are your main technical skills?
faqs.answer: I specialize in Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, TensorFlow, NLP, Computer Vision, and AWS. I also have experience with Flask, Streamlit, and various data science tools.

faqs.question: What kind of projects have you worked on?
faqs.answer: I've worked on diverse AI/ML projects including email spam classification using LLMs, plant disease detection with CNNs, crop recommendation systems, AI chatbots, and agricultural simulation systems. Most of my projects focus on practical applications of AI in agriculture and automation.

faqs.question: What is your educational background?
faqs.answer: I'm currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in AI and ML from MCKV Institute of Engineering (2022-2026) with a CGPA of 8.07.

faqs.question: Do you have any work experience?
faqs.answer: Yes, I have internship experience at Hive Tech (Jan 2025-Present) and Edunet Foundation (Dec 2024-Feb 2025) working on AI/ML projects, model development, and deployment on AWS.

faqs.question: What programming languages do you know?
faqs.answer: I'm proficient in Python (my primary language), JavaScript, Java, C, SQL, and have experience with HTML/CSS for web development.

faqs.question: Are you available for new opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, I'm actively looking for opportunities in AI/ML engineering, data science, and software development roles. Feel free to contact me at tuhinkumarsingharoy2001@gmail.com

faqs.question: What are your interests outside of work?
faqs.answer: I enjoy playing football and chess, conducting research, watching documentaries and movies, and creating educational tech content on AI/ML and automation on my YouTube channel 'Tuhin in AIML'.
